AuthorityLimit.title: Authority limit
AuthorityLimit.description: An authority limit that is attached to an authority limit profile

costType.title: CostType
costType.description: The cost type that this limit applies to. If set to null, the limit applies to all cost types.

coverageType.title: CoverageType
coverageType.description: The coverage type that this limit applies to. If set to null, the limit applies to all coverage types.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this authority limit

limitAmount.title: LimitAmount
limitAmount.description: The monetary amount limit defined on the authority limit

limitType.title: LimitType
limitType.description: The limit type on the authority limit

policyType.title: PolicyType
policyType.description: The policy type that this limit applies to. If set to null, the limit applies to all policy types.

AuthorityLimitProfile.title: Authority limit profile
AuthorityLimitProfile.description: An authority limit profile is a collection of authority limits that determine the type of transactions a user can create and whether those new transactions require approval

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency in which the authority limit profile's limits are defined

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: A `true` value indicates that this is a custom profile used by a single user

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of this authority limit profile

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of this authority limit profile

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this authority limit profile

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this authority limit profile

Catastrophe.title: Catastrophe
Catastrophe.description: Represents a catastrophe to code claims with. Each catastrophe has a unique name and catastrophe number.

active.title: Active
active.description: True if a catastrophe can be assigned to a new claim

bottomRightLatitude.title: Bottom right latitude
bottomRightLatitude.description: Latitude for the bottom right point of the area of interest, in degrees

bottomRightLongitude.title: Bottom right longitude
bottomRightLongitude.description: Longitude for the bottom right point of the area of interest, in degrees

catastropheValidFrom.title: Catastrophe valid from
catastropheValidFrom.description: Start date when this catastrophe is valid

catastropheValidTo.title: Catastrophe valid to
catastropheValidTo.description: Date when this catastrophe is no longer valid

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

pcsCatastropheNumber.title: PCS catastrophe number
pcsCatastropheNumber.description: PCS catastrophe number from ISO data feed

policyEffectiveDate.title: Policy effective date
policyEffectiveDate.description: Effective date for retrieving policy locations from the policy system

policyRetrievalCompletionTime.title: Policy retrieval completion time
policyRetrievalCompletionTime.description: Time when last policy retrieval location was completed

policyRetrievalSetTime.title: Policy retrieval set time
policyRetrievalSetTime.description: Time when policy location retrieval parameters were last set

scheduleBatch.title: Schedule batch
scheduleBatch.description: Boolean field to mark a catastrophe to be run in the CatastropheClaimFinder batch process

topLeftLatitude.title: Top left latitude
topLeftLatitude.description: Latitude for the top left point of the area of interest, in degrees

topLeftLongitude.title: Top left longitude
topLeftLongitude.description: Longitude for the top left point of the area of interest, in degrees

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of the catastrophe (for example, ISO or internal)

CatastrophePeril.title: Catastrophe peril
CatastrophePeril.description: Details of perils associated to a catastrophe

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lossCause.title: Loss cause
lossCause.description: The loss cause associated to the peril

lossType.title: Loss type
lossType.description: High level claim type (for example, Auto or Property)

CatastropheZone.title: Catastrophe zone
CatastropheZone.description: A zone of a catastrophe. It contains the zone code, the zone type and the country to which the region belongs.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country to which this `CatastropheZone` belongs

geographicZone.title: Geographic zone
geographicZone.description: A geographic zone used as a template to create this `CatastropheZone`. Upon creation, this `CatastropheZone` will be assigned the geographic zone's code, country, and zoneType.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

ICDCode.title: ICD code
ICDCode.description: The International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems (ICD) are medical diagnosis codes that classify diseases

bodySystem.title: Body system
bodySystem.description: A broad classification of diagnosis types

edition.title: Edition
edition.description: The ICD edition of the code

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

ICDCodeSearchRequestAttributes.title: ICD code search request attributes
ICDCodeSearchRequestAttributes.description: Criteria of the ICD code to search for

activeDate.title: Active date
activeDate.description: A date and time at which the ICD code is active

bodySystem.title: Body system
bodySystem.description: A broad classification of diagnosis types

edition.title: Edition
edition.description: The ICD edition of the code

authorityLimitProfile.title: AuthorityLimitProfile
authorityLimitProfile.description: The authority limit profile associated to this user
